Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We are going to use a common table expression (CTE) or a subquery to first count the number of events per case_id. Then, we will use that count to filter the original event_log table, only keeping cases with count <= 6.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Steps: 1. Count the events per case_id (lets call this case_counts). 2. Join the original event_log with case_counts on case_id and filter where the count <= 6.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Alternatively, we can use the WITH clause for the counts and then do an inner join.
